Name: Heli Golf
About the game: This is a very different kind of golf game, you can control a helicopter to play golf, instead of using the pole, and you can fly straight to the hole and drop the ball The arrow keys ↑ control the take-off, the arrow keys ←→ control the left and right movement, press the space bar to drop the ball. Control the plane to the golf ball, and then fly to the hole above (the red flag) press the space bar will put the ball into the hole. How to start When the GAME is loaded, click Start Game - then select Level 1 to START the GAME The game goal Control the helicopter and drop the ball safely into the red flag.
